description: This file defines the AccessControl namespace and struct with static methods for managing file ownership and permissions, particularly for POSIX systems. It includes functions to change file ownership, set permissions, and apply access controls based on NodeId objects.

classes.name: AccessControl
classes.description: A struct providing static methods to manage file ownership and permissions, especially on POSIX systems, for a given node represented by NodeId.

methods.name: uint32_t OwnerShip(const string & node,const string & userName,const string & groupName)
methods.description: Sets the ownership of the specified node to the username and group name provided, on POSIX systems.

methods.name: uint32_t Permission(const string & node,const uint16_t modeFlags)
methods.description: Sets the permissions of the specified node to the given mode flags, on POSIX systems.

methods.name: uint32_t Apply(const Core::NodeId & node)
methods.description: Applies ownership and permission changes to a NodeId object based on its properties.
